title: Rush Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Rush multi-package build tool

$schema.description: The metadata to indicate the JSON schema, required by some editors such as VS2015

commonFolder.description: Specifies the name of a top-level global folder containing a package.json file with a superset of all dependencies for all projects in the repository.  Example: 'common'

npmVersion.description: The version of the NPM tool to install.

projectFolderMinDepth.description: The minimum folder depth for the projectFolder field.  The default value is 2, i.e. a single slash in the path name.

projectFolderMaxDepth.description: The maximum folder depth for the projectFolder field.  The default value is 2, i.e. a single slash in the path name.

projects.description: A list of projects managed by this tool.

packageName.description: The NPM package name of the project.

projectFolder.description: The path to the project folder relative to the Rush config file.
